typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	fileName as string ('4')
}
source(output(
		{Transaction Date - تاريخ الحركة } as string,
		{Transaction Type Code - كود نوع الحركة} as string,
		{Item Code - كود الصنف} as string,
		{Item Barcode - باركود الصنف} as string,
		{Your Company CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للشركة} as string,
		{Other Entity CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للطرف الاخر} as string,
		{Company Store/Inventory Code - رقم المخزن } as string,
		{Quantity - الكمية} as string,
		{Selling Price per unit - سعر البيع للوحدة  -} as string,
		{Comon Referance No. -  رقم المرجع المشترك} as string,
		{Internal Transfer Number/Code - رقم التحويل الداخلي} as string,
		{Number of Consumer Invoices - عدد فواتير البيع للمستهلك} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> processingCsv
processingCsv derive(STG_FILENAME = $fileName,
		STG_FILEDATE = left(toString(fromUTC(currentTimestamp(), 'Asia/Istanbul')),19),
		TRANSACTION_DATE = regexReplace({Transaction Date - تاريخ الحركة },'[^0-9a-zA-Z]+','')) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn keyGenerate(output(SK_ID_SUR as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		TRANSACTION_DATE as string,
		TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE as string,
		ITEM_CODE as string,
		ITEM_BARCODE as string,
		YOUR_COMPANY_CR as string,
		OTHER_ENTITY_CR as string,
		COMPANY_STORE_INVENTORY_CODE as string,
		QUANTITY as string,
		SELLING_PRICE_PER_UNIT as string,
		COMMON_REFERANCE_NO as string,
		INTERNAL_TRANSFER_NUMBER_CODE as string,
		NUMBER_OF_CONSUMER_INVOICES as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ID_YEARMONTHDAY = TRANSACTION_DATE,
		ID_TRANSACTION_TYPE = {Transaction Type Code - كود نوع الحركة},
		ID_ITEM_CODE = {Item Code - كود الصنف},
		ID_ITEM_BARCODE = {Item Barcode - باركود الصنف},
		ID_ENTITY_CR = {Your Company CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للشركة},
		ID_CUSTOMER_ENTITY_CR = {Other Entity CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للطرف الاخر},
		ID_COMPANY_STORE_CODE = {Company Store/Inventory Code - رقم المخزن },
		MT_QUANTITY = {Quantity - الكمية},
		MT_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT = {Selling Price per unit - سعر البيع للوحدة  -},
		ID_COMMON_REF_CODE = {Comon Referance No. -  رقم المرجع المشترك},
		ID_TRANSFER_CODE = {Internal Transfer Number/Code - رقم التحويل الداخلي},
		ID_INVOICE_NUMBER = {Number of Consumer Invoices - عدد فواتير البيع للمستهلك},
		SK_ID = SK_ID_SUR,
		STG_FILENAME,
		STG_FILETIME = STG_FILEDATE
	)) ~> stgTransactions

parameters{
	fileName as string ('4')
}
source(output(
		RationDate as string,
		{Group Code} as string,
		OperationType as string,
		{Supply/Distribution} as string,
		AccountCR as string,
		Amount as string,
		{Spoiled Quantity} as string,
		CustomDeclarationNo as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> processingCsv
processingCsv derive(STG_FILENAME = $fileName,
		STG_FILEDATE = left(toString(fromUTC(currentTimestamp(), 'Asia/Istanbul')),19)) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn keyGenerate(output(SK_ID_SUR as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		TRANSACTION_DATE as string,
		TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE as string,
		ITEM_CODE as string,
		ITEM_BARCODE as string,
		YOUR_COMPANY_CR as string,
		OTHER_ENTITY_CR as string,
		COMPANY_STORE_INVENTORY_CODE as string,
		QUANTITY as string,
		SELLING_PRICE_PER_UNIT as string,
		COMMON_REFERANCE_NO as string,
		INTERNAL_TRANSFER_NUMBER_CODE as string,
		NUMBER_OF_CONSUMER_INVOICES as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> AllTransactions

source(output(
		ReleaseNotification as (Declaration as (ItemDetails as (Item as (countryOfOrigin as string, declaredValue as short, declaredValueQAR as short, foreignCurrency as string, hscode as integer, itemQuantity as boolean, itemQuantityUOM as string, netWeight as short, netWeightUOM as string)[]), SupervisorDetails as (Supervisor as (mobileNumber as string, name as string)[]), accountType as string, address as string, bolNumber as string, cargoManifestNumber as string, carrierName as string, clearingAgencyCR as short, clearingAgencyNameAR as string, clearingAgencyNameEng as string, companyName as string, companyNameAr as string, countryOfLoading as string, declarationNo as string, declarationStatus as string, declarationType as string, email as string, entryOrExitPortName as string, establishmentId as integer, exporterName as string, firstCountryOfLoading as string, importerName as string, masterBolOrAWBNumber as string, portOfLoading as string, portType as string, releaseOrderNumber as long, releasedDate as string, supplierCR as short, supplierCustomsCode as short, voyageOrFlightNumber as string), NotificationDate as string, NotificationRef as string, NotificationSender as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'xml',
	fileSystem: 'input',
	fileName: 'pendinginspection.xml',
	nullValue: 'null',
	validationMode: 'xsd',
	namespaces: true,
	namespacePrefixes: ['https://dlsapsmsiidt001.blob.core.windows.net/input/dene.xsd'->'dene.xsd']) ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(ReleaseNotification.Declaration.SupervisorDetails.Supervisor),
	mapColumn(
		ReleaseNotification = ReleaseNotification.NotificationDate,
		NotificationRef = ReleaseNotification.NotificationRef,
		NotificationSender = ReleaseNotification.NotificationSender,
		mobileNumber = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.SupervisorDetails.Supervisor.mobileNumber,
		name = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.SupervisorDetails.Supervisor.name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenSupervisor
source1 foldDown(unroll(ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item),
	mapColumn(
		NotificationSender = ReleaseNotification.NotificationSender,
		NotificationDate = ReleaseNotification.NotificationDate,
		NotificationRef = ReleaseNotification.NotificationRef,
		countryOfOrigin = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.countryOfOrigin,
		declaredValue = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.declaredValue,
		declaredValueQAR = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.declaredValueQAR,
		foreignCurrency = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.foreignCurrency,
		hscode = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.hscode,
		itemQuantity = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.itemQuantity,
		itemQuantityUOM = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.itemQuantityUOM,
		netWeight = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.netWeight,
		netWeightUOM = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.netWeightUOM
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenItem
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		NotificationSender = ReleaseNotification.NotificationSender,
		NotificationDate = ReleaseNotification.NotificationDate,
		NotificationRef = ReleaseNotification.NotificationRef,
		ReleaseNotification = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.accountType,
		address = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.address,
		bolNumber = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.bolNumber,
		cargoManifestNumber = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.cargoManifestNumber,
		carrierName = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.carrierName,
		clearingAgencyCR = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.clearingAgencyCR,
		clearingAgencyNameAR = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.clearingAgencyNameAR,
		clearingAgencyNameEng = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.clearingAgencyNameEng,
		companyName = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.companyName,
		companyNameAr = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.companyNameAr,
		countryOfLoading = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.countryOfLoading,
		declarationNo = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.declarationNo,
		declarationStatus = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.declarationStatus,
		declarationType = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.declarationType,
		email = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.email,
		entryOrExitPortName = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.entryOrExitPortName,
		establishmentId = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.establishmentId,
		exporterName = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.exporterName,
		firstCountryOfLoading = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.firstCountryOfLoading,
		importerName = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.importerName,
		masterBolOrAWBNumber = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.masterBolOrAWBNumber,
		portOfLoading = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.portOfLoading,
		portType = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.portType,
		releaseOrderNumber = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.releaseOrderNumber,
		releasedDate = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.releasedDate,
		supplierCR = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.supplierCR,
		supplierCustomsCode = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.supplierCustomsCode,
		voyageOrFlightNumber = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.voyageOrFlightNumber
	)) ~> DECLARATION
FlattenItem sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> ITEM
FlattenSupervisor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SUPERVISOR

source(output(
		DT_FILE as date,
		DS_ENTITY_CODE as string,
		ID_ENTITY as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		ID_ISUPLOADED as integer,
		ID_ISREJECTED as boolean,
		DS_EMAIL as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> dwhfilelist
source(output(
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		ID_ISEXPECTED as integer,
		DS_EMAIL as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> stgfilelist
dwhfilelist, stgfilelist exists(dwhfilelist@DS_FILENAME == stgfilelist@DS_FILENAME,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists
Exists alterRow(updateIf(not(isNull(DS_FILENAME)))) ~> AlterRow2
AlterRow2 derive(ID_ISUPLOADED = 1,
		DS_EMAIL = 'ali.demir@obase.com') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		DT_FILE as date,
		DS_ENTITY_CODE as string,
		ID_ENTITY as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		ID_ISUPLOADED as integer,
		ID_ISREJECTED as boolean,
		DS_EMAIL as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['DS_FILENAME'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2

source(output(
		DT_FILE as date,
		DS_ENTITY_CODE as string,
		ID_ENTITY as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		ID_ISUPLOADED as integer,
		ID_ISREJECTED as boolean,
		DS_EMAIL as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> dwhfilelist
source(output(
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		ID_ISEXPECTED as integer,
		DS_EMAIL as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> stgfilelist
dwhfilelist, stgfilelist exists(dwhfilelist@DS_FILENAME == stgfilelist@DS_FILENAME,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NotExists
NotExists alterRow(updateIf(not(isNull(DS_FILENAME)))) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 derive(ID_ISUPLOADED = 0,
		DS_EMAIL = 'ali.demir@obase.com') ~> idisexpected
idisexpected sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		DT_FILE as date,
		DS_ENTITY_CODE as string,
		ID_ENTITY as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		ID_ISUPLOADED as integer,
		ID_ISREJECTED as boolean,
		DS_EMAIL as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['DS_FILENAME'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'excel',
	fileSystem: 'input',
	fileName: 'Company Profile and warehouse - store  Template.xlsx',
	sheetName: 'بيانات الشركة',
	range: 'A7:Q17',
	firstRowAsHeader: true) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

properties.description: Stg file list tablosuna containerdaki dosyaları insert eden pipeline

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	itemname as string (toString('CRFR_20210321.csv'))
}
source(output(
		dummy as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select 1 as dummy',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> dummy
dummy derive(itemname = $itemname) ~> itemname
itemname sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		ID_ISEXPECTED as integer,
		DS_EMAIL as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		DS_FILENAME = itemname
	)) ~> stgfilelist

properties.description: Stg file list tablosuna containerdaki dosyaları insert eden pipeline

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	itemname as string (toString('CRFR_20210321.csv'))
}
source(output(
		dummy as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select 1 as dummy',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 2,
		dummy
	)) ~> dummy
dummy derive(itemname = $itemname) ~> itemname
itemname sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		ID_ISEXPECTED as integer,
		DS_EMAIL as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		DS_FILENAME = itemname
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 2,
		DS_FILENAME
	)) ~> stgfilelist

parameters{
	itemname as string (toString('CRFR_20210321.csv'))
}
source(output(
		ID as integer,
		DT_FILE as date,
		DS_ENTITY_CODE as string,
		ID_ENTITY as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		ID_ISEXPECTED as integer,
		DS_EMAIL as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> dwhfilelist
source(output(
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		ID_ISEXPECTED as integer,
		DS_EMAIL as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> stgfilelistsrc
stgfilelistsrc, dwhfilelist exists(stgfilelistsrc@DS_FILENAME == dwhfilelist@DS_FILENAME,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> notExists
AlterRow1 derive(ID_ISEXPECTED = 0,
		DS_EMAIL = 'ali.demir@obase.com') ~> idisexpected
notExists alterRow(updateIf(not(isNull(DS_FILENAME)))) ~> AlterRow1
idisexpected sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		ID_ISEXPECTED as integer,
		DS_EMAIL as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['DS_FILENAME'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> stgfilelisttrgt

parameters{
	p_stg_filename as string (STG_FILENAME)
}
source(output(
		TRANSACTION_DATE as string,
		TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE as string,
		ITEM_CODE as string,
		ITEM_BARCODE as string,
		YOUR_COMPANY_CR as string,
		OTHER_ENTITY_CR as string,
		COMPANY_STORE_INVENTORY_CODE as string,
		QUANTITY as string,
		SELLING_PRICE_PER_UNIT as string,
		COMMON_REFERANCE_NO as string,
		INTERNAL_TRANSFER_NUMBER_CODE as string,
		NUMBER_OF_CONSUMER_INVOICES as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp,
		ID_ERROR_CODE as integer,
		DS_ERROR_CODE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> transactionerrorlog
transactionerrorlog derive(STG_FILENAME = replace(DS_FILENAME,'.','_err.')) ~> stgfilename
stgfilename sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		TRANSACTION_DATE as string,
		TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE as string,
		ITEM_CODE as string,
		ITEM_BARCODE as string,
		YOUR_COMPANY_CR as string,
		OTHER_ENTITY_CR as string,
		COMPANY_STORE_INVENTORY_CODE as string,
		QUANTITY as string,
		SELLING_PRICE_PER_UNIT as string,
		COMMON_REFERANCE_NO as string,
		INTERNAL_TRANSFER_NUMBER_CODE as string,
		NUMBER_OF_CONSUMER_INVOICES as string,
		DS_ERROR_CODE as string
	),
	rowUrlColumn:'STG_FILENAME',
	umask: 0777,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		TRANSACTION_DATE,
		TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE,
		ITEM_CODE,
		ITEM_BARCODE,
		YOUR_COMPANY_CR,
		OTHER_ENTITY_CR,
		COMPANY_STORE_INVENTORY_CODE,
		QUANTITY,
		SELLING_PRICE_PER_UNIT,
		COMMON_REFERANCE_NO,
		INTERNAL_TRANSFER_NUMBER_CODE,
		NUMBER_OF_CONSUMER_INVOICES,
		DS_ERROR_CODE
	)) ~> errorlogcsv

source(output(
		ID_YEARMONTHDAY as string,
		ID_TRANSACTION_TYPE as string,
		ID_ITEM_GROUP as string,
		ID_ITEM_CODE as string,
		ID_ITEM_BARCODE as string,
		ID_ENTITY_CR as string,
		ID_CUSTOMER_ENTITY_CR as string,
		ID_SOURCE_WAREHOUSE as string,
		ID_TARGET_WAREHOUSE as string,
		MT_QUANTITY as string,
		ID_UOM as string,
		MT_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT as string,
		ID_LPO as string,
		ID_SALES_ORDER as string,
		ID_DELIVERY_NOTE as string,
		ID_GRN as string,
		ID_INVOICE as string,
		ID_RETURN_NOTE as string,
		ID_CUSTOMS_STATEMENT as string,
		ID_REFERANCE_CODE as string,
		MT_INVOICE_COUNT as string,
		DS_TRANSACTION_REASON as string,
		SK_ID as string,
		STG_FILENAME as string,
		STG_FILETIME as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		ID_YEARMONTHDAY as string,
		ID_TRANSACTION_TYPE as string,
		ID_ITEM_GROUP as string,
		ID_ITEM_CODE as string,
		ID_ITEM_BARCODE as string,
		ID_ENTITY_CR as string,
		ID_CUSTOMER_ENTITY_CR as string,
		ID_SOURCE_WAREHOUSE as string,
		ID_TARGET_WAREHOUSE as string,
		MT_QUANTITY as string,
		ID_UOM as string,
		MT_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT as string,
		ID_LPO as string,
		ID_SALES_ORDER as string,
		ID_DELIVERY_NOTE as string,
		ID_GRN as string,
		ID_INVOICE as string,
		ID_RETURN_NOTE as string,
		ID_CUSTOMS_STATEMENT as string,
		ID_REFERANCE_CODE as string,
		MT_INVOICE_COUNT as string,
		DS_TRANSACTION_REASON as string,
		SK_ID as string,
		STG_FILENAME as string,
		STG_FILETIME as string,
		ID_ERROR_CODE as integer,
		DS_ERROR_CODE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 exists(source1@SK_ID == source2@SK_ID
	&& source1@STG_FILENAME == source2@STG_FILENAME,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NotExists1
NotExists1 derive(NewDate = coalesce(toDate(ID_YEARMONTHDAY,'MM/dd/yyyy'),toDate(ID_YEARMONTHDAY,'yyyy/MM/dd'),toDate(ID_YEARMONTHDAY,'dd/MM/yyyy'),toDate(ID_YEARMONTHDAY,'MMddyyyy'),toDate(ID_YEARMONTHDAY,'yyyyddMM'),toDate(ID_YEARMONTHDAY,'MMddyyyy'),toDate(ID_YEARMONTHDAY,'yyyyMMdd'),toDate(ID_YEARMONTHDAY,'yyyy.MM.dd'),toDate(ID_YEARMONTHDAY,'dd.MM.yyyy'),toDate(ID_YEARMONTHDAY,'MM.dd.yyyy')),
		NewMTQuantitiy = replace(MT_QUANTITY,',','')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ID_YEARMONTHDAY = NewDate,
		ID_TRANSACTION_TYPE,
		ID_ITEM_GROUP,
		ID_ITEM_CODE,
		ID_ITEM_BARCODE,
		ID_ENTITY_CR,
		ID_CUSTOMER_ENTITY_CR,
		ID_SOURCE_WAREHOUSE,
		ID_TARGET_WAREHOUSE,
		MT_QUANTITY = NewMTQuantitiy,
		ID_UOM,
		MT_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT,
		ID_LPO,
		ID_SALES_ORDER,
		ID_DELIVERY_NOTE,
		ID_GRN,
		ID_INVOICE,
		ID_RETURN_NOTE,
		ID_CUSTOMS_STATEMENT,
		ID_REFERANCE_CODE,
		MT_INVOICE_COUNT,
		DS_TRANSACTION_REASON,
		SK_ID,
		STG_FILENAME,
		STG_FILETIME
	)) ~> sink1

parameters{
	fileName as string ('4')
}
source(output(
		{Transaction Date - تاريخ الحركة } as string,
		{Transaction Type Code - كود نوع الحركة} as string,
		{Item Code - كود الصنف} as string,
		{Item Barcode - باركود الصنف} as string,
		{Your Company CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للشركة} as string,
		{Other Entity CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للطرف الاخر} as string,
		{Company Store/Inventory Code - رقم المخزن } as string,
		{Quantity - الكمية} as string,
		{Selling Price per unit - سعر البيع للوحدة  -} as string,
		{Comon Referance No. -  رقم المرجع المشترك} as string,
		{Internal Transfer Number/Code - رقم التحويل الداخلي} as string,
		{Number of Consumer Invoices - عدد فواتير البيع للمستهلك} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> processingxlsx
processingxlsx derive(STG_FILENAME = $fileName,
		STG_FILEDATE = left(toString(fromUTC(currentTimestamp(), 'Asia/Istanbul')),19),
		TRANSACTION_DATE = regexReplace({Transaction Date - تاريخ الحركة },'[^0-9a-zA-Z]+','')) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn keyGenerate(output(SK_ID_SUR as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		TRANSACTION_DATE as string,
		TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE as string,
		ITEM_CODE as string,
		ITEM_BARCODE as string,
		YOUR_COMPANY_CR as string,
		OTHER_ENTITY_CR as string,
		COMPANY_STORE_INVENTORY_CODE as string,
		QUANTITY as string,
		SELLING_PRICE_PER_UNIT as string,
		COMMON_REFERANCE_NO as string,
		INTERNAL_TRANSFER_NUMBER_CODE as string,
		NUMBER_OF_CONSUMER_INVOICES as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		TRANSACTION_DATE,
		TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE = {Transaction Type Code - كود نوع الحركة},
		ITEM_CODE = {Item Code - كود الصنف},
		ITEM_BARCODE = {Item Barcode - باركود الصنف},
		YOUR_COMPANY_CR = {Your Company CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للشركة},
		OTHER_ENTITY_CR = {Other Entity CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للطرف الاخر},
		COMPANY_STORE_INVENTORY_CODE = {Company Store/Inventory Code - رقم المخزن },
		QUANTITY = {Quantity - الكمية},
		SELLING_PRICE_PER_UNIT = {Selling Price per unit - سعر البيع للوحدة  -},
		COMMON_REFERANCE_NO = {Comon Referance No. -  رقم المرجع المشترك},
		INTERNAL_TRANSFER_NUMBER_CODE = {Internal Transfer Number/Code - رقم التحويل الداخلي},
		NUMBER_OF_CONSUMER_INVOICES = {Number of Consumer Invoices - عدد فواتير البيع للمستهلك},
		ID_SK = SK_ID_SUR,
		DS_FILENAME = STG_FILENAME,
		DT_FILETIME = STG_FILEDATE
	)) ~> stgTransactions

parameters{
	fileName as string ('a')
}
source(output(
		{Item Code} as string,
		Barcode as string,
		{Product Name Arabic} as string,
		{Description Arabic} as string,
		{Product Name English} as string,
		{Description English} as string,
		{Unit Item Barcode } as string,
		{No Of Unit Items} as string,
		{Unit Weight/size} as string,
		{Unit UOM} as string,
		{Package UOM} as string,
		{Cost Price} as string,
		{Selling Price} as string,
		{Brand-Trade Mark English} as string,
		{Brand-Trade Mark Arabic} as string,
		{MoCI Product Group} as string,
		{Country of Oragen Name} as string,
		{Country of Oragen ISO} as string,
		{HS Code} as string,
		{Supplier CR} as string,
		{Supplier Name} as string,
		{Category Level 1} as string,
		{Category Level 1_2} as string,
		{Category Level 1_3} as string,
		{Category Level 1_4} as string,
		Width as string,
		Height as string,
		Depth as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> InputProductsxlsx
Select1 derive(STG_FILENAME = $fileName,
		STG_FILEDATE = left(toString(fromUTC(currentTimestamp(), 'Asia/Istanbul')),19)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 keyGenerate(output(SK_ID_SUR as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
InputProductsxlsx select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			regexReplace($$,'[^a-zA-Z]','') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ITEM_CODE as string,
		BARCODE as string,
		PRODUCT_NAME_ARABIC as string,
		DESCRIPTION_ARABIC as string,
		PRODUCT_NAME_ENGLISH as string,
		DESCRIPTION_ENGLISH as string,
		UNIT_ITEM_BARCODE as string,
		NO_OF_UNIT_ITEMS as string,
		UNIT_WEIGHT_SIZE as string,
		UNIT_UOM as string,
		PACKAGE_UOM as string,
		COST_PRICE as string,
		SELLING_PRICE as string,
		BRAND_TRADE_MARK_ENGLISH as string,
		BRAND_TRADE_MARK_ARABIC as string,
		MOCI_PRODUCT_GROUP as string,
		COUNTRY_OF_ORAGEN_NAME as string,
		COUNTRY_OF_ORAGEN_ISO as string,
		HS_CODE as string,
		SUPPLIER_CR as string,
		SUPPLIER_NAME as string,
		CATEGORY_LEVEL_1_1 as string,
		CATEGORY_LEVEL_1_2 as string,
		CATEGORY_LEVEL_1_3 as string,
		CATEGORY_LEVEL_1_4 as string,
		WIDTH as string,
		HEIGHT as string,
		DEPTH as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ITEM_CODE = ItemCode,
		DS_FILENAME = STG_FILENAME
	)) ~> stgProducts
